# Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Scaffold the Project - React + Vite + TypeScript project created
- [x] Customize the Project - Firebase Firestore and PWA configured
- [x] Install Required Extensions - No additional extensions needed
- [x] Compile the Project - Dependencies installed, build successful
- [x] Create and Run Task - Ready to run with `npm run dev`
- [ ] Launch the Project - Use `npm run dev` to start development server
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README.md with full instructions created
